alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; Western Skagit County; Western Strait of Juan De Fuca; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 24 at 2:40AM PDT until October 26 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County, Admiralty Inlet Area, Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca and Western Strait of Juan De Fuca. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; Western Skagit County; Western Strait of Juan De Fuca; Western Whatcom County
